question: I'm a 20 year old, female with this kidney disorder. I guess it's pretty uncommon for females to have symptoms of it because we are normally just carriers. But in my family, if you have the disorder, you have some of the symptoms regardless of your gender. I was just curious if anyone else on here has it? I haven't come across anyone outside of my family that does yet!
title: Nephrogenic Diabetes Insipidus??
